context: Zillow Group, Inc. is a real estate technology company focused on real estate marketplace, rentals, and home services. Real estate portal with Zestimate valuations.

competitors.name: Trulia
competitors.notes: Founded 2005, main competitor before 2015 acquisition for $2.5B

competitors.notes: NAR-owned listing site, official MLS data

competitors.name: Homes.com
